sentences.en: But I think I could be safe a nice toffee.
sentences.cn: 但是我想选颗太妃糖口胃的应该会安全些吧.

sentences.en: Children with a mean consumption of biscuits, milk toffee and chocolate made with such milk powder would also not exceed the TDI.
sentences.cn: 儿童如果不慎吃掉含有污染奶粉的饼干、牛奶太妃糖以及巧克力时，所摄取的三聚氰胺量也不应超过TDI值。

sentences.en: He was sucking a stick of toffee.
I wouldn't go halves in the toffee and gingerbread on purpose to save the money.
sentences.cn: 为了把钱省下来,我不肯把太妃糖和甜饼分给别人.

sentences.en: Jill said I couldn't sing for toffee.
sentences.cn: 吉尔说我一点都不会唱歌。

sentences.en: Lucky Chocolate Toffee brings you luck.
sentences.cn: 幸福太妃糖,幸福的获得.

sentences.en: She felt it rise now as her fingers fumbled beneath soft layers of folded cotton searching for the sharp cold of a shiny metal toffee tin.
sentences.cn: 此刻，当手指在一层层柔软的、叠得整整齐齐的棉衣下翻寻，摸到一只冰凉的、亮晶晶的金属太妃糖罐的时候，这样的兴奋又出现了。

sentences.en: She poked a toffee into my mouth.
sentences.cn: 她把一块太妃糖塞进我的口中.
这种混合物凝结之后就成了太妃糖.

sentences.en: The mixture will solidify into toffee.
sentences.cn: 这种混合物凝固后就成了太妃糖。

sentences.en: The special treat was to eat maple toffee after meal.
sentences.cn: 好的享受还是午饭过后吃枫糖太妃.

sentences.en: The sugar caramelized to give an elusive toffee - like flavor that makes the pie even more beguiling.
sentences.cn: 糖熔化成焦糖之后,便有了一种难以捉摸的类似太妃糖的口味,这让南瓜派变得更诱人了.

sentences.en: The toffee was smooth and delicious.
sentences.cn: 这种太妃糖吃起来鲜美可口.

sentences.en: This is our complimentary dish, toffee apple.
sentences.cn: 这是我们奉送的菜, 拔丝苹果.

phrases.phrase: not be able to do something for toffee
phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)完全不能胜任某事，干不来某事

trans.tran_cn: 太妃糖，做某事很蹩脚，不能胜任某事
trans.tran_en: a sticky sweet brown substance that you can eat, made by boiling sugar, water, and butter together, or a piece of this substance
